mapper.select: select room_id as id, ( select max(m.content) keep(dense_rank first order by m.send_time desc) from chat_message m where m.room_id=r.room_id) as lastcontent, to_char((select max(send_time) from chat_message m where m.room_id=r.room_id), 'MM.DD') sendtime, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller FROM chat_room r2 WHERE r.room_id = r2.room_id AND r2.seller = 'b'), r.buyer, r.seller), null) receiverid, (select count(*) from chat_message m where m.room_id=r.room_id and m.read_check='N' and m.sender!='b') unreadcount, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller FROM chat_room r2 WHERE r.room_id = r2.room_id AND r2.seller = 'b'), (SELECT hh_user.nick_name FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.buyer), (SELECT hh_user.nick_name FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.seller)), null) receivernickname, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller FROM chat_room r2 WHERE r.room_id = r2.room_id AND r2.seller = 'b'), (SELECT hh_user.profile_img FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.buyer), (SELECT hh_user.profile_img FROM hh_user WHERE hh_user.id = r.seller)), null) receiverimg, (select max(msg_id) as max_message_no from chat_message m where r.room_id = m.room_id) as maxmessageno from chat_room r where seller='b' or buyer='b' order by maxmessageno desc nulls last

select COALESCE(NVL((SELECT img_name from img_files i where r.sell_seq=i.table_pk and i.img_cate_seq=2 and rownum=1), (SELECT img_name from img_files i where r.auc_seq=i.table_pk and i.img_cate_seq=3 and rownum=1)), null) AS productImg, coalesce(nvl2((select sell_seq from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id), (SELECT product_price from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq), (SELECT max(bid_price) from auction_history a where r.auc_seq=a.auc_prod_seq)),null) as productPrice, coalesce(nvl2((select sell_seq from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id), (SELECT ARTICLE_TITLE from sell_product s where r.sell_seq=s.product_seq), (SELECT auction_TITLE from auc_product a where r.auc_seq=a.product_seq)),null) as productName, COALESCE(NVL2((SELECT seller from chat_room r2 where r2.room_id=r.room_id and r2.seller=#{loginUserId}), '판매자', '구매자'), null) AS status from chat_room r where r.room_id=#{chatRoomId}
